message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It has the potential to significantly impact your business operations and enhance your profits. Considering its value to you, I am offering it to you for $1200000. This is a special introductory price, tailored to ensure a mutually beneficial partnership.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your perspective on the value it brings to your business. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $1050000. This reflects the high quality and potential impact of the product on your operations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $900000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

I understand your position, Bob. Let's aim for a compromise that respects both our interests. I am willing to consider $980000 as the price for the product. This offers a slight increase from my previous offer while still being within your budget considerations.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $950000. I'm willing to meet you at $960000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

I respect your decision, Bob. To further explore this opportunity, I propose a price of $975000 for the product. This reflects a middle ground between our previous offers and maintains a reasonable profit margin for us.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $970000, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I see your point, Bob. Let's try to find common ground. I am willing to accept $972500 as the price for the product. This is slightly above your last offer and below mine, aiming for a fair solution that benefits both parties.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $970000, but I think we can do even better. I'm willing to go up to $971000, but no higher. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
